# HiMama is now Lillio!

The building blocks for high-quality childcare.  
Now with a new name.

Request a demo

Reviewed by 35,000+ happy customers

4.9

## #1

rated childcare  
solution

## 1.8B+

moments shared  
with families

## 500k+

curated curriculum  
kits delivered

Lillio (formerly HiMama) has opened the door for more positive communication.
Educators can now share routine updates throughout the day, and save the
valuable face-to-face time for meaningful conversations.

Shannon Eastman

Eanes ISD Child Development Center

Director | 8 Locations

Since implementing Lillio (formerly HiMama) I have seen a change in the
quality of documentation going out, and our parent communication has
drastically improved. Not only that, but my relationship with Lillio (formerly
HiMama) has been amazing!

Sarah Rhodebeck

Gateway Region YMCA

Executive Director | 15+ locations

Lillio (formerly HiMama) has put our center on the map. We have the longest
waitlist we have ever had, our positive google reviews from parents have
tripled and our parent communication has improved 100%.

Irene Sheridan

Heart Beatz Child Care

Owner | 4 Classrooms

Center Management

## Streamline admin work

Manage staff, review reports, track attendance, and manage registrations. Your
administrative tasks, billing, and payments have never been easier.

Learn more

Professional Learning

## Empower your staff

Access professional development courses from Lillio Academy (formerly HiMama
Academy). Featuring a wide-range of topics and lessons at your own pace.
Available on any device, any time and anywhere, all while earning continuing
education credits.

Learn more

## World-class  
customer support

Get access to an award-winning onboarding team, a dedicated account manager,
and a support team that is just an email or call away. Lillio is committed to
your center’s success.

support@himama.com1-844-975-1275

## Why partner with Lillio

Here’s how our platform makes a real impact in the lives of educators,
directors, families and childcare centers worldwide.

100%

uplift in Happy Vine Villa’s parent satisfaction.

85%

of parents believe that communication helps them support their child’s
developmental.

77%

of parents want more details about their child’s day.

95%

of customers say Lillio fosters better communication with parents.

## What our customers are saying

Sort reviews by center size to see how Lillio supports  
different organizations.

Home DaycareSingle LocationMulti Center

“Getting time back in my life is the number one piece of value I have found
with Lillio (formerly HiMama). There are so many value-adds, but if I had to
narrow it down to just one, it would be time, because time is something we
never get back”

Miriam Owens

Bright Beginning Childcare LLC

“I think the best thing Lillio (formerly HiMama) did for our center was
increase staff morale. Teachers did not take this job to spend hours doing
paperwork. Lillio has helped my teachers connect more with families and devote
more time to the children”

Missy Knechel

Victory Early Learning Academy

“Since implementing Lillio (formerly HiMama), I have seen a change in the
quality of documentation going out and our parent communication scores have
gone up. Lillio brings peace of mind that all parents are receiving quality
communication across all classrooms and centers”

Sarah Rhodebeck

Gateway region YMCA

“The parents are always so impressed with how much the children are learning
at my center through the FunShine activities. They love them. FunShine has
certainly helped increase the quality of my center, which has helped boost
parent referrals and enrolment”

Alejandra M. Barranca

Ales Home Daycare

“I would say 98% of the positive reviews we get about our center are because
of how happy parents are with the communication and documentation in Lillio
(formerly HiMama)”

Elina Kompaniyets

Alphabet Treehouse Childcare

“All of our families are thrilled with Lillio (formerly HiMama). The
communication scores at both locations improved 100% and our google reviews
tripled overnight. Lillio (formerly HiMama) makes everyones days easier and
more enjoyable”

Irene Sheridan

Heart Beats Child Care

Having HiMama and FunShine Express curriculum as a partner in my program has
given me 6 hours of my time back, high-quality lesson plans for my children
and elevated parent satisfaction by 150%

Briana Salyers

Happy Vine Villa

“It is all these little conversations that we are now able to have with
families throughout the day that have really helped us to build trust and a
strong community”

Micah Pugh

Kings Kids Child Development Center

“The fact that educators can link the documentation directly to our early
learning framework has given parents a deeper understanding and a new
vocabulary for what is happening and has really opened their eyes to the value
of bringing their children to our childcare"

Dorie Heffron

BrightPath (Beaches Location)
